attributes.action: ask the SPL why they REFUSED to help Rangers FC in the chance for UEFA glory?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since Rangers FC have reached a final in Europe for the first time in 36 years, all Rangers fans thought that our League would help us out.

How wrong we were, we are now facing playing 7 games in 18 days.

The team we face in the final, Zenit, have been given 13 days to prepare for the final, with all games postponed, to aid them in becoming cup winners.

We do not request 'special treatment', we only ask for a level playing field, as almost 5 years to the day Celtic were given 8 clear days to prepare.

Why are Rangers not given help to prepare and perhaps win the UEFA cup, which would only serve in helping Scottish football as a whole?

rejection.details: Sport is self-governing in the UK
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
